title: Social Domain Simulation Education Design Through Reflective Design Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Providing a socially contextualized simulation environment for workplace problem-solving. Enables real-time data collection and analysis using personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can develop three or more social issue simulation scenarios by applying a goal-oriented pattern-based design model.
Learners can iteratively improve VR simulation designs at least twice by analyzing formative assessment data.
Learners can document reflective practice processes to explain the relationship between instructional design patterns and learning outcomes.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
